厄勒海峽.definition: Øresund; The Sound (strait between Denmark and Sweden)

厄娃.definition: Eve, the first woman (transcription used in Catholic versions of the Bible) (from Hebrew Ḥawwāh)

厄爾尼諾.definition: El Niño, equatorial climate variation in the Pacific

厄爾尼諾現象.definition: El Niño effect, equatorial climatic variation over the Pacific Ocean

厄爾布魯士.definition: (Mount) Elbrus, the highest peak of the Caucasus mountains, southwest Russia
